section.title: What can <highlight>AI</highlight> do for your company?
section.subtitle: Automations with measurable results implemented in modular construction companies.

presupuestos.title: Automatic Budget Generation
presupuestos.subtitle: From 3 days to 2 hours
presupuestos.description: AI that analyzes plans, specifications, and cost databases to automatically generate detailed budgets.
benefits: Automatic measurement extraction from PDF/DWG plans
presupuestos.useCase: Prefab module company reduced budgeting time from 3 days to 2 hours.

planificacion.title: Intelligent Production Planning
planificacion.subtitle: Factory optimization
planificacion.description: Algorithms that optimize production sequence, resource allocation, and delivery logistics.
planificacion.useCase: CLT panel plant increased throughput by 23% with no additional investment.

documentacion.title: Documentation Automation
documentacion.subtitle: Goodbye to manual paperwork
documentacion.description: Automatic generation of technical sheets, certifications, quality reports, and project documentation.
documentacion.useCase: Construction company eliminated 15h/week of administrative work.

chatbot.title: AI Assistant for Teams
chatbot.subtitle: 24/7 technical support
chatbot.description: Internal chatbot trained on your technical documentation, procedures, and regulations.
benefits: Access manuals and regulations from WhatsApp
chatbot.useCase: Site team resolves technical questions in seconds instead of calling the office.

calidad.title: Visual Quality Control with AI
calidad.subtitle: Automatic defect detection
calidad.description: Computer vision that analyzes production photos to detect defects, deviations, and non-conformities.
calidad.useCase: 3D module factory reduced post-delivery claims by 40%.

comercial.title: Sales Automation
comercial.subtitle: More sales, less admin
comercial.description: Automatic lead follow-up flows, personalized proposals, and client nurturing.
comercial.useCase: Sales rep went from managing 20 to 60 leads/month without hiring.

custom.title: Don't see your case? <highlight>We create custom solutions.</highlight>
custom.description: Every modular construction company has unique processes. If you have a specific bottleneck, we analyze your situation and design a personalized automation.
features: Integration with any software (ERP, CAD, BIM, Excel...)
